name: Baldi's Basics Android Loves cars
description:
UH UH OH, Your new friend lost 7 notebooks again at school house and baldi have a new nice car which baldi use it in the school because baldi likes cars, but that does not matter (may be). It's been a month since baldi loves cars ate those chips, since then, 1st Prize has been ran away and being killed baldi loves cars rip dead funeral thing, the bully has become an illegal chip seller, and education things have been going super weird learning recently.. Just as usual thing baldi likes cars that happen in baldi school baldi drives a car in a middle of school house and just... get out from that freak school house!

Just Like baldi in a Wheelchair, baldi loves cars mod makes 1st Prize baldi, and baldi can now kill you, the difference is, baldi is much more flexible in his new car, because baldi ran me over with a car baldi likes cars so much but because of the car he use, baldi does have a hard time finding you around.

- Now baldi is in a car and baldi loves cars, he can turn fast and can run you over.
- Now bully trades with you, if you don't have any items though, he'll just disappear.
- Big news, playtime is broken af.
- Our principal may gives you 8 hour of suspension if you broke any rules.
- The original baldi will be replaced with 1st Prize robot, which means the original Baldi is dead killed gone forever RIP :(
- Some items are deleted and replaced with new ones
- And many more!!1!!1!!

It's a next sequel to a baldi likes car joke mod so it's still a baldi loves cars joke mod
